area-chart.name: 面积图
area-chart.dataHint: Array<{label: string, value: number, value2?: number}>
area-chart.useCase: 展示数据随时间变化的趋势和累积效果

bar-chart.name: 柱状图
bar-chart.useCase: 对比不同类别的数值大小

horizontal-bar-chart.name: 水平条形图
horizontal-bar-chart.useCase: 横向对比不同类别的数值大小，适合标签较长的场景

multi-line-chart.name: 多线折线图
multi-line-chart.dataHint: Array<{label: string, value1: number, value2: number, value3?: number, value4?: number}>
multi-line-chart.useCase: 展示多条数据线的趋势对比，适合相关性分析、多指标对比等场景

pie-chart.name: 饼图
pie-chart.useCase: 展示各部分占总体的比例

donut-chart.name: 环形图
donut-chart.useCase: 展示占比关系，中心可显示汇总数据

scatter-chart.name: 散点图
scatter-chart.dataHint: Array<{x: number, y: number, label?: string}>
scatter-chart.useCase: 分析两个变量之间的相关性

stacked-bar-chart.name: 堆叠柱状图
stacked-bar-chart.dataHint: Array<{label: string, value: number, value2?: number}>
stacked-bar-chart.useCase: 对比多个系列的累积效果

combination-chart.name: 组合图
combination-chart.dataHint: Array<{label: string, value: number, value2?: number}>
combination-chart.useCase: 结合多种图表类型展示复杂数据关系

trend-chart.name: 趋势图
trend-chart.useCase: 突出显示数据的趋势和方向

waterfall-chart.name: 瀑布图
waterfall-chart.useCase: 展示累积变化，分析增减因素

funnel-chart.name: 漏斗图
funnel-chart.useCase: 分析销售漏斗或用户转化流程

pareto-chart.name: 帕累托图
pareto-chart.useCase: 识别关键因素，遵循80/20法则

tornado-chart.name: 龙卷风图
tornado-chart.dataHint: Array<{label: string, low: number, high: number}>
tornado-chart.useCase: 敏感性分析，展示变量影响范围

bullet-chart.name: 子弹图
bullet-chart.dataHint: Array<{label: string, value: number, target: number}>

matrix-chart.name: 矩阵图
matrix-chart.dataHint: Array<{x: number, y: number, label: string}>
matrix-chart.useCase: 多维度分析和决策矩阵，支持BCG、SWOT等类型

risk-reward-chart.name: 风险收益图
risk-reward-chart.dataHint: Array<{x: number, y: number, label: string}>
risk-reward-chart.useCase: 评估投资的风险与回报平衡

rule-of-40-chart.name: Rule of 40图表
rule-of-40-chart.dataHint: Array<{name: string, growth: number, margin: number}>
rule-of-40-chart.useCase: SaaS公司增长与利润率平衡分析

burn-rate-chart.name: 燃烧率图
burn-rate-chart.dataHint: Array<{label: string, burn: number, cash: number}>
burn-rate-chart.useCase: 分析公司现金消耗速度和资金跑道

cac-payback-chart.name: CAC回收期图
cac-payback-chart.useCase: 分析客户获取成本的回收周期

ndr-bridge-chart.name: NDR桥接图
ndr-bridge-chart.dataHint: Array<{name: string, value: number, fill: string}>
ndr-bridge-chart.useCase: 分析净收入留存率的构成因素

unit-economics-chart.name: 单位经济图
unit-economics-chart.dataHint: Array<{name: string, cac: number, margin: number}>
unit-economics-chart.useCase: 评估单个客户的经济价值

sales-velocity-chart.name: 销售速度图
sales-velocity-chart.useCase: 衡量销售团队的整体效率

tam-sam-som-chart.name: TAM/SAM/SOM图
tam-sam-som-chart.useCase: 展示可触达市场的层次结构

value-chain-chart.name: 价值链图
value-chain-chart.useCase: 分析产业链各环节的利润分配

capital-stack-chart.name: 资本结构图
capital-stack-chart.dataHint: Array<{name: string, senior: number, mezzanine: number, equity: number}>
capital-stack-chart.useCase: 展示融资结构的层次和组成

valuation-chart.name: 估值图
valuation-chart.useCase: 多种估值方法的可视化展示

break-even-chart.name: 盈亏平衡图
break-even-chart.dataHint: Array<{units: number, revenue: number, cost: number, profit: number}>
break-even-chart.useCase: 分析达到盈亏平衡所需的销量或收入

inventory-turnover-chart.name: 库存周转图
inventory-turnover-chart.dataHint: Array<{name: string, inventory: number, turnover: number}>

pe-j-curve-chart.name: PE J曲线
pe-j-curve-chart.useCase: 展示私募基金的典型回报曲线

whale-curve-chart.name: 鲸鱼曲线
whale-curve-chart.useCase: 分析客户盈利能力分布

simple-candle-chart.name: K线图
simple-candle-chart.dataHint: Array<{name: number, open: number, high: number, low: number, close: number}>
simple-candle-chart.useCase: 展示股票或资产的价格变动

radar-chart.name: 雷达图
radar-chart.dataHint: Array<{subject: string, value: number, fullMark?: number}>
radar-chart.useCase: 多维度能力评估和对比分析

solid-radar-chart.name: 实心雷达图
solid-radar-chart.useCase: 实心填充的多维度数据展示，弱化网格线，增强阴影效果

scrollable-momentum-chart.name: 可滚动动量图
scrollable-momentum-chart.dataHint: Array<{m: string, growth: number, cap: number, heat: number}>
scrollable-momentum-chart.useCase: 展示12个月趋势数据，支持横向滚动和可点击图例切换显示

status-grid-chart.name: 状态网格图
status-grid-chart.useCase: 以2x2网格布局展示多个项目的状态信息，支持高风险、警告、正常三种状态

progress-bars-chart.name: 进度条图表
progress-bars-chart.useCase: 以2列网格布局展示多个指标的进度条，适用于仪表盘、评分卡等场景
